channel.title: Question about spawning npcs and making them drop
channel.description: Umm first of all, how do you spawn npcs? I know you can do ::npc but they dont respawn. So yeah, can someone give me codes and tell me where they go etc? 2nd, how do you edit moster drops? Please tell me code and where it goes on that 1 too :) Thanks in advance :) You can use rock crabs as an ex. enemy.. NPC ID for Rock crab is 1267.

item.title: Question about spawning npcs and making them drop
item.dc:creator: @blood5 blood5
item.description:
@blood5 wrote:

[quote=“twinky12341, post:6, topic:293644”]hmm npcdrops.cfg lets get a rock crab to drop something shall we?

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 1267 1 35 1

thats how you make a drop i got off of google.com all credits to them.[/quote]
or open open item2.java and add this

public static int Man[] = {
955, 955, 955};

public static int randomMan() {
        return skeleton[(int) (Math.random() * skeleton.length)];
    }

it have to be full name put the name where Man at
go to NPCHandler.java fo ctrl+f and put this in it

 if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 18) {
    ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomguard(),
          npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,
          GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
                            }

under that add this

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid) {
   ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomMan(),
         npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,
         GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Question about spawning npcs and making them drop

item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

hmm npcdrops.cfg lets get a rock crab to drop something shall we?

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 1267 1 35 1

thats how you make a drop i got off of runelocus.com all credits to them.

item.title: Question about spawning npcs and making them drop
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

spawn = 1267 2667 3712 0 2671 3716 2625 3708 1

it goes in autospawn.cfg the 2667 and the 3712 us the cords edit those to where you want the rock crab to go and leave the rest alone file save and compile and leave a response if it worked
